The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 09 December is 1,514,139 (2,690 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 04 December, there were 84,983 new confirmed cases (151.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 November, there were 89,063 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 5% (4,080 fewer cases).
